snippet: Thurman won a piece of the welterweight title with a bruising decision win in Las Vegas over Robert Guerrero in the debut of a prime-time boxing series on NBC.
abstract: Keith Thurman defeats Robert Guerrero by unanimous decision to capture World Boxing Association version of 147-pound crown.
lead_paragraph: Thurman won a piece of the welterweight title with a bruising decision win in Las Vegas over Robert Guerrero in the debut of a prime-time boxing series on NBC.
